title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The StyledText component is experiencing inefficient redraws when there is a change in the text and word wrap is enabled.
OB: During a text change with word wrap enabled, the StyledText component is not efficiently redrawing. This can be observed by adding the following line to the `StyledText.performPaint` method: `System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);`
EB: During a text change with word wrap enabled, the StyledText component should efficiently redraw to prevent unnecessary performance impact. The `performPaint` method needs to be optimized to avoid unnecessary redraws.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText component.
2. Make a text change.
3. Observe the redraws occurring by adding the line `System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);` to the `StyledText.performPaint` method.
